    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void actionPerformed​(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
      what happens each frame detects collision and determines if boost time is up and updates players position
      void draw​(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
      method that repaint calls draws the players
      void init()
      initializes game structures that are needed makes doublebuffer so the image does not flicker when it refreshes, should refresh every 15ms draws the splash screen on the screen initializes all sounds
      static boolean isEmpty​(int x, int y)
      method that is called inorder to see if a certain pixel is empty checks by seeing if the pixel is black
      void keyPressed​(java.awt.event.KeyEvent k)
      detecs keypresses sent from the keylistener determines which action to take based on what ley is pressed
      void keyReleased​(java.awt.event.KeyEvent k)
      listens to key release events sent from keyListener and determines correct actions
      void keyTyped​(java.awt.event.KeyEvent k)  
      static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      makes game window and adds keylistener for keystrokes adds Game to gameWindow initializes game by calling game.init();
      void paint​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      method that is called when repaint is called calls draw onto the doubleBufferGraphics to draw players onto it draws the current doubleBuffer image onto the game portion of the gameWindow draws the bottom info bar draws a win message upon a collision
      void roundStart()
      starts a round, puts players in right spots, resets boosts, resets booleans and such also clears the doubleBufferGraphics so that the old trails get deleted

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        makes game window and adds keylistener for keystrokes adds Game to gameWindow initializes game by calling game.init();

      • init

        public void init()
        initializes game structures that are needed makes doublebuffer so the image does not flicker when it refreshes, should refresh every 15ms draws the splash screen on the screen initializes all sounds

      • roundStart

        public void roundStart()
        starts a round, puts players in right spots, resets boosts, resets booleans and such also clears the doubleBufferGraphics so that the old trails get deleted

      • paint

        public void paint​(java.awt.Graphics g)
        method that is called when repaint is called calls draw onto the doubleBufferGraphics to draw players onto it draws the current doubleBuffer image onto the game portion of the gameWindow draws the bottom info bar draws a win message upon a collision
        Overrides:
        paint in class javax.swing.JComponent
        Parameters:
        g - the graphics object that is used to draw onto the doubleBuffer image

      • draw

        public void draw​(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
        method that repaint calls draws the players
        Parameters:
        g - doublebufferGraphics should be passed here after being casted to Graphics2D

      • isEmpty

        public static boolean isEmpty​(int x,
                              int y)
        method that is called inorder to see if a certain pixel is empty checks by seeing if the pixel is black
        Parameters:
        x - x position on the doubleBuffer image to check
        y - y position on the doubleBuffer image to check
        Returns:
        true if empty, false if not
